result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gary M Olson

defendant.name: Olson, Gary M
defendant.address: 8420 W Greenfield Ave,1, West Allis, WI 53214

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Gary M Olson in court.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo in court for Gary M Olson.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defense requests a plea and sentencing date. Defense must file all necessary documents 24 hours before the plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Gary M Olson in court with attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for pretrial conference. Counsel was recently appointed. Defense requests status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 15.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel, received and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Court ordered no contact with Warren W.O. Jr; Jose A.F.; Antonio A.Z.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Defendant Gary M Olson in court with attorney William Hotchkiss.  Defendant Gary M Olson in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gary M Olson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
